channel.title: Run crash
channel.description: Hey guys, I'm new to building RSPS and every source/client I get all have the same problem for me. Whenever I go into my source files and click "run.bat" it always pops up for a split second then closes out. I'm not sure what to edit the file to. Can anyone help me out?

item.title: Run crash
item.dc:creator: @Thor38283828 Thor38283828
item.description:
@Thor38283828 wrote:

Hey guys, I’m new to building RSPS and every source/client I get all have the same problem for me. Whenever I go into my source files and click “run.bat” it always pops up for a split second then closes out. I’m not sure what to edit the file to. Can anyone help me out?
